snippet: Gov. Bruce Rauner has instructed state agencies to divert money from nonunion employee paychecks away from organized labor until a judge settles the matter.
abstract: Illinois Gov Bruce Rauner instructs state agencies to withhold money from nonunion workers' paychecks that would ordinarily go to union coffers until judge settles case on fees paid to unions by workers who choose not to join; unions condemn move.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Bruce Rauner has instructed state agencies to divert money from nonunion employee paychecks away from organized labor until a judge settles the matter.

headline.main: Illinois: Governor Tells Agencies to Divert Union Fees
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Governor Tells Agencies to Divert Union Fees

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees
